definition: to sell illicitly/to bootleg/to sell privately
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt

sentences.english: Hushshop is a place where beer and spirits are sold on the secret.
sentences.chinese: 沒執照的酒店就是私賣啤酒和烈酒的地方。

sentences.english: The illicit sale of liquor should be banned.
